p: A total of nine articles with nine records and a sample size of 3849 reported co-infection of HIV/HCV/HBV in PWID, but no articles reported this co-infection in FSWs. The overall prevalence of co-infection of HIV/HCV/HBV among PWID was estimated to be 2% (95% CI: 1â€“3%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 75.19%) ( Supplementary Figure S12, Table 2).
